name: Fereshteh
description:
Eyes must be washed"""
must view in a different way """(sohrab sepehri)
In this collection,I have tried to show that the type of view and perspective related to different issues of this world has a direct impact on the formation of our final mentality towards that issue, and in many cases, this haste and failure to examine all angles of the issue leads to It becomes an incomplete and incorrect image in our minds and finally our misjudgment..I call each of the works in this collection in the real name of the oppressed girls of the country who fell victim to these cases and the candle of their lives was extinguished very quickly and unjustly.In all these tragic events,a common killer played the main role and it was nothing but :
**hasty judgment due to wrong mentality and incorrect and incomplete
vision of those around**
dedicate this collection to the pure spirit of these loved ones
(the new works of this collection will also be minted over time)
Also, loved ones who collect two works from more than two works from this collection will receive a gif from my next collection, which I will present soon, which is a one edition fractal work..
Mp4 1080P
